title: What is Art? A Pop Art Unit
description: I built this website using Bootstrap, React, and SCSS to demonstrate my web development skills. Instead of using WordPress, which I have experience with, I chose these technologies to refine and enhance my technical expertise. I am hosting my site using AWS lightsail using a <blank> server set up.

title: Embracing Matisse - A Unit on Fauvism and Color Theory
description: I built Digital Dreamers using the latest version of WordPress, leveraging its new drag-and-drop templating system. While I have the skills to create a custom template and develop a unique theme, I chose this approach to streamline content creation and speed up the launch. Additionally, it allowed me to stay updated on WordPress's latest features.

title: Paper Mache Masks - A Cultural View
description: At Demand Boost, I developed a PHP templating system to automate name and address updates, streamlining development. While I preferred React, the owner chose a simpler solution. I've provided a website built with this system and an example on GitHub.
